character.statement: Thank goodness you're here! Copy Cat is inside the bank and we can't catch her!
Thanks for your help. We'll take it from here.
Please help! The bank has been robbed!
It's a good thing you showed up!
The super villains broke into the bank. Copy Cat is still in there!
Thanks! We'll keep an eye on things here.
Business is great today! I'm out of pretzels!
Betty Jetty has flown up the skyscraper. Good luck catching her!
A lady in prison stripes flew past my window!
I hope you can fly as well as that villain up there!
